verses.verse: (For the choir director; on Muth-labben. A Psalm of David.) I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> I will <S%H5608>tell<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H6381>wonders.<s%>
I will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5970>exult<s%> in Thee; I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praise<s%> to Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High.<s%>
When my <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> They <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and perish <S%H6>before<s%> <S%H4480><s%> Thee.
For Thou hast <S%H6213>maintained<s%> my <S%H4941>just<s%> <S%H1779>cause;<s%> Thou dost <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H8199>judging<s%> <S%H6664>righteously.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> Thou hast destroyed the <S%H6>wicked;<s%> Thou hast <S%H7563>blotted<s%> out their <S%H4229>name<s%> <S%H8034>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

The <S%H340>enemy<s%> has <S%H8552>come<s%> to an <S%H8552>end<s%> in <S%H5331>perpetual<s%> <S%H2723>ruins,<s%> And Thou hast <S%H5428>uprooted<s%> the <S%H5892>cities;<s%> The <S%H1992>very<s%> <S%H2143>memory<s%> of them has perished.
But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3427>abides<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> He has <S%H3559>established<s%> His <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment,<s%>
And He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> He will <S%H1777>execute<s%> <S%H1777>judgment<s%> for the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> with <S%H4339>equity.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also will be a <S%H4869>stronghold<s%> for the <S%H1790>oppressed,<s%> A <S%H4869>stronghold<s%> in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%>

And those who <S%H3045>know<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> will <S%H982>put<s%> their <S%H982>trust<s%> in Thee; For Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> hast not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> those who <S%H1875>seek<s%> Thee.
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> <S%H5046>Declare<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> His <S%H5949>deeds.<s%>
For He who <S%H1875>requires<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H2142>remembers<s%> them; He does not <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H6035>afflicted.<s%>

Be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me, O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H7200>Behold<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> from those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, Thou who dost <S%H7311>lift<s%> me up from the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death;<s%>

That I may <S%H5608>tell<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H8416>praises,<s%> That in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> I may <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in Thy <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H2883>sunk<s%> <S%H2883>down<s%> in the <S%H7845>pit<s%> which they have <S%H6213>made;<s%> In the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> they <S%H2934>hid,<s%> their own <S%H7272>foot<s%> has been <S%H3920>caught.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3045>made<s%> Himself <S%H3045>known;<s%> He has <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%> In the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his own <S%H3709>hands<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5367>snared.<s%> <S%H1902>Higgaion<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> [Even] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7913>who<s%> <S%H7913>forget<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
For the <S%H34>needy<s%> will not <S%H5331>always<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten,<s%> Nor the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> perish <S%H6>forever.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> do not let <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H5810>prevail;<s%> Let the <S%H1471>nations<s%> be <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Thee.
<S%H7896>Put<s%> them in <S%H9252>fear,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> Let the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that they are but <S%H582>men.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
